attributes.action: Stop UK main broadcasters using premium rate numbers by limiting call rates to 10 pence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears that the main UK broadcasters BBC, ITV, Channel 4, and Five are generating large returns from the British public by the use of premium rate numbers. This petition seeks that broadcasters are limited to 10 pence return on any call placed on a quiz line advertised via UK TV.
